description.title: TPS - bulk loading the mempool, once complete extract the block times for the TPS profile
description.purpose: In this test, a bulk amount of native OBC transfer transactions are created and signed (1 transfer account, to 25 recipient accounts). Each transaction has a monotonically increasing nonce. Once created all transactions are sent to the node, and the transaction hash stored. The test waits for the last transaction none to be mined/included in a batch, and once done fetches the block/batch each transaction was included into. From this it is possible to then extract the timestamp of the block and graph the number of transactions as a function of time, offset from the first batch. This thus gives a temporal profile of the TPS, and an overall rate based on the total time to send and mine all transactions.
